title: The Sunny south-west
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Dept. of Industry and Commerce, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Perth (W.A.) - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australia - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Western Australia - Description and travel
description: Travelogue which covers a region of South-West Western Australia. Has scenes of Perth on the Swan River and street scenes including trams. War Memorial in Kings Park. Rottnest Island, Yanchup Park, Green Mt. National Park and the Darling Ranges. Bunbury Harbour and its surrounds. Sleeper cutting by hand for the railways from hardwood forests. Albany, originally the major seaport of W.A. Rugged coastal scenes of the region of Calgan River and The Sterling Ranges.
